com.github.cuter44.wxmp.util

类 TokenKeeper

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.github.cuter44.wxmp.util.TokenKeeper

  • public class TokenKeeper
extends java.lang.Object
    Token keeper Keep minding the access token and JSSDK Ticket and their expiration, and automatically refresh if expired.

    • 字段详细资料

      • ENABLE_SINGLETON_MANAGEMENT

        public static boolean ENABLE_SINGLETON_MANAGEMENT
        Switch to enable TokenKeeper to remember and recall instance with same appid. Enabled by default.
        If enabled, TokenKeeper keeps instances generated by TokenKeeper.getInstance(). getInstance() returns same singleton for same appid respectively. If disabled, TokenKeeper.getInstance() create new instance every time it is called, without detecting if there is an existing one. In such case, external restraint is expected (which means you are responsible for the implement).

      • instances

        protected static java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,TokenKeeper> instances

      • getInstance

        public static TokenKeeper getInstance(java.lang.String appid,
                      java.lang.String secret)
        Construct an instance of TokenKeeper. If ENABLE_SINGLETON_MANAGEMENT enabled, return singleton, secret is taken account only once for respective appid.
